blogs.title: Learn React Routing in this blog
blogs.body:
1. Learn basic Form actions by creating a blog. 

2. Learn about the react-router-dom package. Using BrowserRouter, Switch, Route and Link. 3. Understand the difference when we are using Link. Link matches the path defined in the Route section within Switch and redirects to that component without sending the request back to server. 4. Understand how to use React Router Params using useParams hooks. Using useParams we can get the parameter name i.e. id defined in the Route within Switch in the main component.

blogs.title: We Will Learn this!
blogs.body:
# Creating Blog Using

1. react-router-dom package
2. React BrowserRouter, Switch, Route, Link
3. useParams and useHistory hooks
4. Form Manipulation using Two Way Binding
5. JSON Server for handling REST API Endpoints
6. Using GET, POST, DELETE requests to the Backend-Server using fetch
